alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:57PM CDT until July 01 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON COUNTY... At 456 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lakesite to near Harrison to near Chattanooga, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Lakesite, Ridgeside, Harrison, Collegedale, East Brainerd, Harrison Bay State Park, East Ridge, Ooltewah and Lakeview. This includes Interstate 75 in Tennessee between mile markers 1 and 15. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
